mapper.select: SELECT ln.nickname AS nickname, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT rn.room_name SEPARATOR '+') AS room_names, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT( LPAD(FLOOR(lr.start_time/60),2,'0'), ':', LPAD(MOD(lr.start_time,60),2,'0'), '-', LPAD(FLOOR(lr.end_time/60),2,'0'), ':', LPAD(MOD(lr.end_time,60),2,'0') ) ORDER BY lr.start_time SEPARATOR ',' ) AS live_periods, SUM(IFNULL(lr.live_minutes,0)) AS total_minutes, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lr.remark SEPARATOR ',') AS remarks FROM live_records lr LEFT JOIN live_nicknames ln ON lr.nickname_id = ln.id LEFT JOIN live_rooms rn ON lr.room_id = rn.id WHERE lr.live_date >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AND lr.live_date < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURDATE()) GROUP BY ln.nickname HAVING total_minutes < 500
